dct_title_s: Völker- und Sprachenkarte des Vorderen Orient / bearbeitet im Geographischen Dienst des Auswärtigen Amts.
dct_description_sm: Shows the ethnic, linguistic, and religious makeup of the Middle East using color code . Religious affiliations are indicated by their their symbols. A relatively lengthy explanation in German begins by stating that this map "endeavors to show the coverage area of those oriental peoples, whose areas are part of Europe's interest ..." Ancillary map: Bevolkerungsdichte des Vorderen Orient [population density].
